environment_variables.OPENMPI_OPTS: --mca btl_openib_ib_mtu 4 --mca btl_openib_use_eager_rdma 1 --mca btl_openib_eager_limit 1024 --mca btl_openib_priority 1 --mca mpool_rdma_rcache_size_limit 268435456 --mca btl_self_min_rdma_size 536870911 --mca btl_self_max_rdma_size 536870911 --mca mpi_paffinity_alone 1 --mca maffinity_base_verbose 1 --mca paffinity_base_verbose 1 --mca maffinity 1 -x OMPI_HOME=$OMPI_HOME -x LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$LD_LIBRARY_PATH -x PATH=$PATH -x OMP_NUM_THREADS=$OMP_NUM_THREADS
